10/10

In my opinion this game is pure fun because it is very casual it's easy to mod and has an addicting gameplay.
As i said it's way more casual that the newest and most popular CS game, CSGO and that is a good thing that this game wasn't designed to be a competitive shooter,but more of a casual shooter that showcases the technological capabilities of the source engine.Most of the people buy this game for the GMOD textures but I think this game is way more than that.
If u have a decent aim the gameplay is fun and there are still around 6-7K players that keep the game alive.
You can install mods easely and most of the time they work enhancing the experience.
In conclusion,this game is a solid 8/10 and shouldn't be so underrated.
